Method Detail

doInBackground

public java.lang.Object doInBackground(java.lang.Object key)
Receives a "key", which is a URL plus optional additional lines of text to create a unique cacheable hash code. This returns a JSONModel of the data provided by the HTTP server.

Overrides:
doInBackground in class HttpGetter
